details: Resolved accessibility and usability issues across Azure Portal experiences, including fixing non-responsive context panes and improving keyboard/screen-reader behavior
Investigated and debugged partner-reported issues in shared APIs used by hundreds of internal Microsoft teams by tracing feature-flag query parsing and request logic

Collaborated with authentication teams to enable secure access to protected test cloud environments and implemented load testing to evaluate endpoint scalability (CPU usage, throughput, concurrent users)
Modernized legacy code by migrating components to React and resolving race conditions introduced by dependency injection lifecycle differences
Maintained package hygiene across large dependency trees by auditing version constraints, removing deprecated packages, and preventing security and compatibility risks
Implemented and maintained frontend/backend integration logic for Azure networking resources, ensuring reliable rendering of service configuration data
Created Load Balancerâ€™s frontend IP configuration components in TypeScript React for Azure Portal, ensuring user-friendly interface
Utilized Ajax to make API calls to backend endpoints for displaying and rendering Load Balancer data. Organized localization files for global usage
Developed and executed scenario tests to verify component functionality and write unit tests using Jest and Mocha. Incorporated security measures to maintain secure access for Azure Portal customers
Designed and implemented a cross-platform Text-to-Speech application and a gamepad sample prototype to enhance native platform support using C++ programming
Formulated a core API library that exposed platform-specific text-to-speech functionalities on both Windows and PS5 platforms
Devised and structured the UI for both Text-to-Speech and gamepad sample applications, employing the ImGui library alongside internal gamepad libraries
Developed a web application to help notify admins when an application or its database is down.
Worked with the framework Vuejs to display an application's status.
Built backend logic and routes using Axios and Express to connect front-end UI to store in state data.
Taught children from the ages of 5 to 16 how to code in Javascript, HTML, and CSS using popular video games, such as Minecraft and Roblox.
Created and organized coding lessons that focused on basic code syntac and logical problem solving.
